description: Built a scalable e-commerce app using React and TypeScript for product showcasing, estimation, and order tracking. Optimized performance with efficient components and design patterns
Developed intuitive user interfaces that seamlessly showcase the company’s diverse range of products.
Leveraged AWS S3 buckets for file storage and CloudFront CDN to optimize image loading and caching.

Employed OAuth for secure authentication, Redux for efficient state management, and implemented comprehensive error handling with TypeScript for enhanced code readability, maintainability, and a seamless user experience.
